alert.note: Alert for Adams (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 24 at 11:28AM CDT until further notice by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at Winfield. Mississippi River at Quincy. Mississippi River at Lock & Dam 21. Mississippi River at LaGrange. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at Clarksville. Mississippi River at Hannibal. Mississippi River at Louisiana. Mississippi River at Saverton. Mississippi River at Canton. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Quincy. * WHEN...From late Thursday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, All America and Bob Bangert parks begin to flood. Also, the Art Keller Marina walkways and the south boat ramp at Kesler Park begin flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM CDT Monday the stage was 16.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Friday morning and continue rising to 20.9 feet Sunday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Mississippi River Quincy 19.0 16.0 16.8 17.5 18.3 19.2 20.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
